Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.addons

Interface DesignOSoulsAddOn

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, AldrichTheDevourer, Axe, Bonfire, Broadsword, Bug, Cemetery, Chest, CindersOfaLord, Crater, DarkmoonLongbow, Dirt, Enemies, EstusFlask, Fire, Floor, Floor, Floor, FogDoor, GameWeaponItem, GiantAxe, Ground, Item, LockedDoor, LordOfCinder, MartianItem, MeleeWeapon, Mimic, Player, Player, Player, PortableItem, RangedWeapon, Skeleton, Stick, StormRuler, Sword, Token, Tree, Undead, Valley, Vendor, Wall, Wall, WeaponItem, YhormsGreatMachete, YhormTheGiant
public interface DesignOSoulsAddOn
NOTE: Use this interface to add specific features according to the Assignment's scenario

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default Soul asSoul()
    Allows upcasting for Actor, Ground, or Item to a Soul instance if possible.

  • Method Details

    • asSoul

      default Soul asSoul()
      Allows upcasting for Actor, Ground, or Item to a Soul instance if possible.
      Returns:
      a reference to the current Actor/Ground/Item as type Soul, or null if this Actor/Ground/Item doesn't implement Soul.
